# Module: tf.keras.datasets.imdb



Defined in [`tensorflow/keras/datasets/imdb/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.10/tensorflow/keras/datasets/imdb/__init__.py).
